Name: PictoPull
About the game: Solve 3D block puzzles built from pixel art. Pull, push, and climb on the blocks of a PictoPull puzzle in order to reach the goal. Puzzles are simple to learn but complex to master, as puzzles get bigger, more complex, and new special tiles and mechanics are added onto them. Once you have mastered all of the 150+ PictoPull levels try creating your own in the fully featured level editor and share them via the Steam Workshop. 150 Story Levels Spread across 10 environments A fully featured level editor to export and share levels Bonus Level packs with extra levels and the ability to create your own level packs to share multiple levels at once. Steam workshop support to share levels and level packs
